oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Letter from Reverend J.T. Meriwhether regarding Mississippi's secession from the Union
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Letter from Reverend John Thomas to his brother-in-law Edmond Allen Taylor. Meriwhether writes of the community's excitement about what they believe will be the immiment secession and the certainty that Mississippi will leave the Union. Mississippi was the second Southern state to secede and join the Confederacy, doing so on January 9, 1861.
